title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-4.4 - Report of appointment; application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-4.4 - Report of appointment; application

State Regulations
(a) The county clerk shall notify ORPTS of
the appointment of an individual as county director within five days of such
appointment. This notice shall include the name and address of the individual
and the effective date of the appointment. (b) Prior to the appointment of a county
director the appointing authority shall provide ORPTS and the local civil
service commission or personnel officer with a completed application form. The
application shall provide for the applicant's educational background, employment history, professional designations, and an affirmation of the truth
of the statements contained in the application. (c) At the request of ORPTS, additional
material must be submitted to supplement the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
